CN.content:

Paragraph: In the case of PQCDTB , unlike the PQA2T ( poly[quinacridone-bithiophene] ) reported by Takimiya et al.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PQCDTB |
| PQA2T ( poly[quinacridone-bithiophene] ) |

In this paragraph, the two "Material Name" entities are "PQCDTB" and "PQA2T ( poly[quinacridone-bithiophene] )". These entities are mentioned as materials in the context of the paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PQCDTB |
| poly[quinacridone-bithiophene] |

In this revised list, I have removed the parenthesized phrase "reported by Takimiya et al." as it is not part of the material name. The two material names in the paragraph are "PQCDTB" and "poly[quinacridone-bithiophene]".
